name: Shrink! (HabebusGames)
description:
Shrink!

This game is my first game made with Unity. I got some help from my brother (his itch.io page here, he will be releasing a game soon too) You play as a ball, and you can control it with 2 simple controls:

Z to Shrink or Grow

Spacebar to Jump

Using these controls, you must time your jumps and choose when to shrink or grow, to avoid the red obstacles.

What's Coming

I will definitely be adding more features to the game with future updates, such as a high score system, more obstacles, and possibly different game modes. Stay tuned for the updates. This definitely won't be my last game made with Unity, and there will be more games to come. Hope you enjoy this game!
